segments.text: Out of every movie that you've seen , which one is your favorite ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to have to say that Superbad is the best movie ever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're not lying , I found that movie absolutely hilarious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know that you saw Superbad before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I made sure to be in line to see it the first day it came out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't keep from laughing throughout the whole movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was laughing hysterically the whole time ; my stomach muscles hurt afterwards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got the movie when it came out on DVD , do you want to come over ?
segments.speaker: S1
